The line links Warsaw to Lublin and continues onward to Ukraine. It has been used to deliver aid to that country.

NASA, SpaceX Launch US-European Satellite to Monitor Earth’s Oceans
summary: NASA and its partners launched the Sentinel-6B satellite, about the size of a full-size pickup truck, to provide critical ocean and atmospheric data. This information aims to enhance hurricane forecasts, safeguard infrastructure, and support commercial activities like shipping.
